#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	long long t,i,j,a[10010],n,e,f,p[510],w[505];
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		fill(a,a+10010,INT_MAX);
		cin>>e>>f;
		f = f-e;
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin>>p[i]>>w[i];
		}
		a[0]=0;
		for(i=1;i<=f;i++){
			for(j=0;j<n;j++){
				if(i==w[j]){
					a[i] = min(a[i],p[j]);
				}
				else if(i>w[j] ){
					a[i] = min(p[j]+a[i-w[j]],a[i]);
				}
			}
		}
		if(a[f] != INT_MAX){
			cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<a[f]<<"."<<endl;
		}
		else{
			cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
